They seem to be calling out to their former owner" | Found in Sandgate Village - Valley of Despair iin a secret area after defeating the First Prince of Flowing Sands (optional boss) and having the boss destroy the mural wall in the arena to reveal the secret area in Yellow Wind Ridge | • Allows access through the waterfall in Forest of Wolves - Outside the Forest in Black Wind Mountain. • Allows access through the sand waterfall in Fright Cliff - Rockrest Flat in Yellow Wind Ridge. • Activates the Cyan Loong statue on Bitter Lake - Turtle Island in The New West. • Activates the fight with Yellow Loong in Relief of the Fallen Loong in The Webbed Hollow| Loong Scales
![Keeness of Tiger .jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/6/61/Keeness_of_Tiger_.jpg)| Keeness of Tiger| Rare | "The Mysterious gadget found on Tiger Vanguard's body has a strange shape and might be used to unlock a certain mechanism" | Defeat Tiger Vanguard in the Crouching Tiger Temple - Temple Entrance (mandatory boss) in Yellow Wind Ridge| • Use on the tallies in conjunction with the Sterness of Stone throughout Yellow Wind Ridge to access the path under the Crouching Tiger Temple, and open the doors at Sandgate Village - Valley of Despair and Yellow Sand Formation - Windrest Gate | Keeness of Tiger

img_summary: The image depicts the "Keeness of Tiger," a rare item found in the game "Black Myth: Wukong." This mysterious gadget is obtained by defeating the Tiger Vanguard at the Crouching Tiger Temple in Yellow Wind Ridge. It is used in conjunction with the Sterness of Stone to unlock mechanisms and access hidden paths and doors within the game, specifically in Sandgate Village and Yellow Sand Formation.
